param.name: riid
param.para: The reference id for the device.

param.name: ppDevice
param.para: The address of a pointer to the device.

returns.para: A code that indicates success or failure (see DXGI_ERROR).

remarks.para: The type of interface that is returned can be any interface published by the device. For example, it could be an IDXGIDevice * called pDevice, and therefore the REFIID would be obtained by calling __uuidof(pDevice).

summary.para: Inherited from objects that are tied to the device so that they can retrieve a pointer to it.

remarks.para: Windows Phone 8: This API is supported.
